type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="3"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">title @p actionbar {"text": "You name="NUM">20</field></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> second(s) left on the cooldown!", "color": "orange"}</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
